sample_row.name: Team Outing at Sterling
sample_row.meta_title: Sterling Team Outing: Unwind and Reconnect
sample_row.meta_description: Elevate your senses at Sterling in Yelagiri, ideal for team building, offsites, and outings. Nestled in a serene location with a pleasant climate, this resort provides an inviting environment for teams to relax and bond. Well-designed accommodations and a peaceful ambiance ensure a comfortable stay, offering your team an opportunity to rejuvenate amidst the natural beauty of Yelagiri.
sample_row.stay_description: Sterling in Yelagiri invites you to elevate your senses, perfect for team building, team offsite, and team outings. Set in a serene location with a pleasant climate, this resort provides an inviting environment for teams to relax and bond. The well-designed accommodations and peaceful ambiance ensure a comfortable stay and an opportunity for your team to rejuvenate amidst the natural beauty of Yelagiri.
sample_row.location: Sterling, Salem - Yercaud Main Road, Yelagiri Hills, Tamil Nadu - 635853
